title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern portfolio website built with Astro and React, showcasing professional experience and projects. Features clean design, responsive layouts, dark mode support, and optimal performance through static site generation.

title: Digital Wedding Invitation Platform
description: A full-stack web application for managing wedding invitations with real-time RSVP functionality. Built with Next.js and Supabase, featuring an elegant interface for sharing event details and tracking guest responses.
